title: Creating a Responsible Online Persona
description: Learn how to create and maintain a positive digital identity through responsible online behavior and digital footprint awareness.

title: Privacy Protection and Cyberbullying
description: Understand privacy settings, learn to protect personal information, and develop strategies for dealing with cyberbullying.

title: Misinformation and Scams
description: Learn to identify misinformation, verify sources, and protect yourself from online scams and phishing attempts.

title: Digital Balance & Wellness
description: Learn strategies for healthy digital habits, screen time management, and maintaining balance between online and offline activities.

title: Review & Final Assessment
description: Apply all learned concepts through interactive challenges and complete the comprehensive digital wellness and safety assessment.

title: Introduction Module
description: Basic introduction to the example course
